ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 13
ygData.msgSnippet: I found an aviak feather on a unique named aviak, not a particularly strong one, however I have the feather and know not what to do with it ??? ... From: Seyil
ygData.messageBody:
I found an aviak feather on a unique named aviak, not a particularly strong
one, however I have the feather and know not what to do with it ???

-----Original Message-----
From: Seyil Yoon <wings@...>
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, May 17, 1999 8:52 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Digest Number 13


>From: Seyil Yoon <wings@...>
>
>On Fri, 14 May 1999, Sergio Non wrote:
>
>> > Anyone found Aviak Feathers yet?
>> > We killed a whole bunch of Aviaks yesterday and got none.
>>
>> You might want to try the Aviak Island in the Ocean of Tears. It's at
>> roughly 2300,4300 -- way off Stormbreaker's path, so you'll have to swim
>> there or take a canoe. The Aviaks there are tougher than what's in South
>> Karana, but should still very easy for a level 22 character like
yourself, I
>> would think.
>
>The aviaks there do not drop aviak feathers, only aviak
>talons (look like chicken feet).
>
>And the aviaks there are actually NOT tougher than
>the ones in South Karana. The toughest aviak
>on the island is much weaker than the tougher
>aviak in South Karana.
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>ONElist: the best source for group communications.
>http://www.onelist.com
>Join a new list today!
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>This list is intended for the trade of Spell components for spell research.
Please keep the emails on topic.
